name: generator-react-redux-express
description: Yeoman generator for using React, Redux, Express with Webpack via Babel

scripts.release:major: npm version prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:minor: npm version prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:patch: npm version prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag beta
